item.title: KKN Residents Association - Our Heroes of 2025
item.description: KKN Residents Association - Our Heroes of 2025 This page proudly verifies the authenticity of the Community Service Awards presented to our deserving youth at the 2nd Annual Celebration of the KKN Residents Association.
